channel.title: CVE Feed for Inkscape -- Inkscape
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Inkscape -- Inkscape

item.title: CVE-2021-42704|2024-08-04T03:38:50.053Z -- inkscape -- inkscape
item.description: Inkscape version 0.91 is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds write, which may allow an attacker to arbitrary execute code.

item.title: CVE-2021-42700|2024-08-04T03:38:50.033Z -- inkscape -- inkscape
item.description: Inkscape 0.91 is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds read, which may allow an attacker to have access to unauthorized information.

item.title: CVE-2021-42702|2024-08-04T03:38:50.116Z -- inkscape -- inkscape
item.description: Inkscape version 0.91 can access an uninitialized pointer, which may allow an attacker to have access to unauthorized information.
